actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to liberalize the conditions governing eligibility of blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Allows blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits under the Federal Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance program of the Social Security Act regardless of whether or not such person has reached age 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act so as to liberalize the conditions governing eligibility of blind persons to receive disability insurance benefits thereunder.
